replies.mcontent: 我是用的win10+wsl2 也下载了ubuntu,但是点运行就出(HTTP code 500) server error - failed to create task for container: failed to create shim task: OCI runtime create failed: runc create failed: unable to start container process: error during container init: error running hook #0: error running hook: exit status 1, stdout: , stderr: Auto-detected mode as 'legacy' nvidia-container-cli: mount error: file creation failed: /var/lib/docker/overlay2/bd5b27f88749abb127d163378d2c140de76c102188fb4d1999871acd444d220b/merged/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libnvidia-ml.so.1: file exists: unknown这个
确认几个点:1. 安装的是windows的cuda驱动 2.wsl安装NVIDIA CUDA toolkit 3.wsl安装NVIDIA Container Toolkit
